install.name: Template Chooser
install.author: Ulti Joomla
install.description: Template Chooser module for Joomla 1.5. The Template Chooser plugin has to be installed to make it work.

param.name: title_length
param.label: Max. Name Length
param.description: This is the maximum length of the template name to display (default 20)

param.name: show_preview
param.label: Show Preview
param.description: Template preview is to be shown

param.name: preview_width
param.label: Width
param.description: This is the width of the preview image (default 140)

param.name: preview_height
param.label: Height
param.description: This is the height of the preview image (default 90)

param.name: select_templates
param.label: Select templates
param.description: Select the templates which will be shown in the template chooser

param.name: keep_cookie
param.label: Keep Cookie
param.description: Store the template choice in a cookie?
